services.name: Bicycle Rental
services.details:
Rent a new and revised bike to use freely during the
contracted time. No distance limit for use.

services.name: Tire Repair
services.details: Analysis and repair of various types of tire bore

services.name: Handlebar installation
services.details: Installation of a good and safety handlebar

services.name: Wheel Routing
services.details: Complete mounting of wheels guaranteeing their safety.

services.name: Cleaning
services.details: Deep cleaning of your bike, cherishing the details and more complex parts.

services.name: Suspension
services.details: Suspension repair and lubrication, with complete integrity and safety check up.
